author: Rosie
name: SMC
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Use `[p]help SMC` to get the list of commands and their description. If you want to help translate, visit my [crowdin project](<https://crowdin.com/project/Star-Cogs>)
If you appreciate my work, consider [donating](<https://ko-fi.com/starcogs>)

This cog allows you to designate a channel where only one message is allowed at a time. When a new message is sent, the previous message is automatically deleted.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data persistently.
